name: FRigUnit_SetRotation
doc: SetRotation is used to set a single rotation on hierarchy.

Item: The item to set the rotation for
Space: Defines if the rotation should be set in local or global space
bInitial:
Defines if the transform should be set as current (false) or initial (true).
Initial transforms for bones and other elements in the hierarchy represent the reference pose's value.
Value: The new rotation of the given item
Weight: Defines how much the change will be applied
bPropagateToChildren:
If set to true children of affected items in the hierarchy
will follow the transform change - otherwise only the parent will move.
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable units together
